rules_text:
{W}{U} ACTIVE AND CHANGE [/b]Control the game by using activated abilities and transforming permanents for extra value.
{U}{B} MILL You plan victory in the long run, hold your opponents down and leave them with no cards left to play.
{B}{R} FROM EXILE Cast spells from exile to outlast your foes by rejuvenating or winning battles.
{R}{G} HOLD THE FRONT LINE Gather power by winning battles and strike through your foes defenses with unstoppable creatures.
{G}{W} NOPON EXCHANGE Nopon are hardy, and will come back ready to fight again, don't be afraid to make trades early to win in the late game.[i]
{W}{B} [/i]REANIMATION Your strongest fighters get another chance at life through reanimation and rejuvenation.[i]
{B}{G} [/i]LEAVES THE GRAVEYARD The grave is a resource, repurpose what is there by turning it into tokens, counters, or more.[i]
{G}{U} [/i]VISTA RAMP Ramp into large creatures by playing extra lands, or once you're out of lands use that resource in other ways.[i]
{U}{R} [/i]EQUIPMENT/VEHICLES Fight your battles with skill and strategy, combine equipment and vehicles to always attack favorably.[i]
{R}{W} [/i]STAGNANT AGGRO[i] [/i]Attack early when its safe, then setup for a final victory strike.[i]
